labsAcf.js:
window.onmousemove = (e) => {
  const x = e.pageX
  const y = e.pageY
  document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--x', `${ x }px`)
  document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--y', `${ y }px`)
  document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--px', `${ 100-x/window.innerWidth*100}%`)
  document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--py', `${ 100-y/window.innerHeight*100}%`)
 
}
